select.query: SELECT identifier FROM document WHERE documentid = $document.id$
SELECT rtext FROM documents.document d where d.documentid = $document.id$ and d.rtext IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(d.rtext) <> ''

select 1 from dual where not exists(select coalesce(g.printinfo, 0) d from documents.carditem c left join dictionaries.cardgroup g on c.idcardgroup = g.idcardgroup where c.documentid = $document.id$ and g.printinfo = 0)

select dictionaries.cardgroup.name e from dictionaries.cardgroup where dictionaries.cardgroup.idcardgroup = (select documents.carditem.idcardgroup from documents.carditem where documents.carditem.documentid= $document.id$)
select bcode dname from documents.goodsitem where documentid = $document.id$

select case opcode when 52 then text_const.text1 else goodsitem.bcode end bcode, CAST((case opcode when 52 then concat(text_const.text2 , goodsitem.deptcode) else goodsitem.name end) AS CHAR) name, dictionaries.units.name unit, sum(if(goodsitem.opcode in (54, 56), -goodsitem.bquant, goodsitem.bquant)) bquant, goodsitem.pricei price, sum(if(goodsitem.opcode in (54, 56), -goodsitem.sumi, goodsitem.sumi)) sumn, sum(if(goodsitem.opcode in (54, 56), -goodsitem.sumb, goodsitem.sumb)) sumb, vatcode1, vatcode2, vatcode3, vatcode4, vatcode5, vatrate1, vatrate2, vatrate3, vatrate4, vatrate5, sum(vatsum1) vatsum1, sum(vatsum2) vatsum2, sum(vatsum3) vatsum3, sum(vatsum4) vatsum4, sum(vatsum5) vatsum5 from documents.goodsitem left join dictionaries.units on measure = dictionaries.units.code left join text_const on text_const.code = 1 where documentid = $document.id$ and goodsitem.bcode='$dname$' group by 1, 2, dictionaries.units.name, goodsitem.pricei, vatcode1, vatcode2, vatcode3, vatcode4, vatcode5, vatrate1, vatrate2, vatrate3, vatrate4, vatrate5
select if($sumn$ > $sumb$, 'СО СКИДКОЙ', 'С НАДБАВКОЙ') discname , abs(($sumn$ - $sumb$) / $sumn$ * 100) discval from DUAL where not $sumn$ = $sumb$
select name vatname from dictionaries.vat where code=$vatcode1$
select st.bcode, st.name, st.bquant, st.sumb, st.price from stornogoodsitem st where st.documentid = $document.id$ group by st.stornogoodsitemid
select count(*) p from goodsitem where documentid = $document.id$
select sum2, sumb from document where documentid = $document.id$
select if($sum2$ > $sumb$, 'CКИДКА', 'НАДБАВКА') dname , if($sum2$ > $sumb$, $sum2$-$sumb$,$sumb$-$sum2$) dval from DUAL where not $sumb$=$sum2$
select cardnumber from discitem where goodsitemid in (select goodsitemid from goodsitem where documentid= $document.id$) and discmode=2 group by 1
SELECT slip FROM moneyitem WHERE documentid = $document.id$ and slip is not null
SELECT rtext FROM documents.document d where d.documentid = $document.id$ and d.rtext IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(d.rtext) <> ''

select 1 from dual where not exists(select coalesce(g.printinfo, 0) d from documents.carditem c left join dictionaries.cardgroup g on c.idcardgroup = g.idcardgroup where c.documentid = $document.id$ and g.printinfo = 1)
